title: Class B/2 (secretin family receptors)
description: This family is known as Family B (secretin-receptor family, family 2) G-protein-coupled receptors. Family B GPCRs include secretin, calcitonin, parathyroid hormone/parathyroid hormone-related peptides and vasoactive intestinal peptide receptors; all of which activate adenylyl cyclase and the phosphatidyl-inositol-calcium pathway (Harmar AJ, 2001).  View original pathway at [http://www.reactome.org/PathwayBrowser/#DIAGRAM=373080 Reactome].
